story.iWant: to receive event reminders and be able to cancel RSVPs with clear reliability impact
story.soThat: I stay informed about my commitments and can manage conflicts responsibly

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: AC1: Event Reminder Notifications - Reminders scheduled on RSVP confirmation at 24h and 1h before event with event details, location, participants, quick actions, delivered via FCM AC2: ETA Quick-Reply System - 1h reminder includes quick-reply actions (On time/5min/10min/15min late/Can't make it) sending updates without opening app AC3: Cancellation Workflow - Cancel RSVP button with 4h grace period check, reliability impact preview, reason selection, deposit void, host notification AC4: Grace Period Logic - 4h window before event, within: no penalty, outside: -2 points late cancellation penalty AC5: Host Notifications - Push notifications on cancellation with timing/reason/count updates, real-time dashboard updates AC6: Reliability Score - Cancellation shows score delta, profile displays check-in/late cancellation/no-show rates with color-coded badges
